decision_conditions: In addition to the plan hereby approved, the condition must alongside be carried out in accordance with the following:
1. The establishment and maintenance of the plants will be managed by the Managing Agent for the site, as they employ the services of appropriately trained and knowledgeable professionals.

2.  Soil will be lightweight substrates such as 'Zinco Green Roof' substrate (or similar approved) to landscape architect specification. Due to the scheme being retrofit with load restriction, substrate depth must be 150mm (post standard lightweight substrate settlement ratio of 30%). The substrate will sit on top of a drainage / water retention layer of 40mm depth (Zinco DF 40 or similar). Irrigation would be automatic. A further drain layer at the base of the planters and along the sides (FD 20 Bauder or similar performance and weight) would drain any excess water away (and would avoid the lightweight material floating).
